data.title: CCISD Realtor Certification Course
data.meta_description: CCISD's Realtor Certification Course shares highlights, educational programs, and District benefits with local realtors to educate and inform new homeowners.
data.text:
Clear Creek ISD values the critical role of realtors in our community.

Often the first connection to new families in the area, realtors serve as ambassadors for the exemplary public education system, the area schools, and unique Pre-K–12 programs.

By enrolling in the Clear Creek ISD Realtor Certification Course, you will learn about what’s going on today - and what’s envisioned for tomorrow - for the students and families who live within the 11 cities of the Clear Creek Independent School District.

Upon completion of the course, you will receive an official CCISD Residential Specialist badge to be used in your correspondence and your name will be listed on this page as a certified residential specialist.
